name: Little Magic Shop (The Sussy Spellcrafters)
description:
This is a first-person store management game in which your little magic shop sales influence the town. Are you going to restore your shop's former glory, or is the town going to hate your guts?

Destructive Magma spell for sale! Only 399$... (for any side effects please contact your local chemist)

This game was a school project where we "The Sussy Spellcrafters" had 6 weeks on us to create a game!

This Great Looking Game is Made in Unreal Engine 5!
